title: Bug 18335: Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
description: Bug 18335: Perspectives lose all their contents when a view is maximized.
OB: All the contents of the perspective (views, layout info) are lost when the following actions are performed in F1: Maximize a view in any perspective. Only the maximized view is present, and all other views are missing from the perspective. It appears that the view maximize code replaces the page layout with a temporary one that only contains the maximized view.
EB: Perspectives should retain all their contents when a view is maximized. The maximized view should be displayed alongside the other views in the perspective.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open any perspective in F1.
2. Maximize a view in the perspective.
3. Observe that all the other views are missing from the perspective and only the maximized view is visible.
